dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters

surname Pi
to break through/to make a breakthrough/to surmount or break the back of (a task etc)/(of ball sports) to break through a defense
destruction/damage/to wreck/to break/to destroy
to break/to smash
to go bankrupt/to become impoverished/bankruptcy
to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
to rupture/to fracture/to break down/(linguistics) plosion
to uncover (a criminal plot)/to break open and capture
to break (a bond, constraint etc)/to explain/to unravel/to decipher/to decode/to crack (software)

to smash to pieces/to shatter
shabby

sentences.english: As soon as the baby cormorant breaks the eggs, it is watched by Damin himself.
sentences.chinese: 小鸬鹚一啄破蛋壳，大明就亲自照看它。

sentences.english: It already has the top advance sales in history.
sentences.chinese: 这书已破了史上最高预订纪录。

sentences.english: The crabs broke this thin net at the first time.
sentences.chinese: 下第一次笼子之后螃蟹就将这个细网子弄破了。

sentences.english: If you have not broken samaya, you will become Buddha eventually.
sentences.chinese: 你若未破三昧耶，你终将成佛。

sentences.english: Breaking kids want to complete their dreams, broken children began learning the motive.
sentences.chinese: 破小孩想要完成自己的梦，破小孩就开始用心学习了。

sentences.english: Breaking kids want to complete their dreams, broken children began learning the motive.
sentences.chinese: 破小孩想要完成自己的梦，破小孩就开始用心学习了。

sentences.english: You lean upon a broken reed, if you trust to their compassion.
sentences.chinese: 你若是指望他们的同情，那你就等于倚在破苇杆上。

sentences.english: The sink was stopped up with hair and fragments of cloth.
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽被头发和破布片给堵住了。

sentences.english: When I come home, I rest in the holes on the broken wall of the well.
sentences.chinese: 当我回到家时，我在破井边的洞里面休息。

sentences.english: The isolation of other cell components is generally associated with the bursting of vacuoles.
sentences.chinese: 其他细胞组分的分离通常伴随着液泡的胀破。

sentences.english: Children have their own broken dreams.
The old worker would not cast off the ragged coat that reminded him of the old days.
sentences.chinese: 老工人不愿丢掉那件使他回忆起过去岁月的破褂子。

sentences.english: A crate of eggs resting inside it was still there, none of the contents broken.
sentences.chinese: 甚至其中的鸡蛋也没有一个破的。

sentences.english: I will break it! Then I will drink the water as it pours out.
sentences.chinese: 水从破罐子里流出来，我就能喝上了。

sentences.english: Effect of lutein on the differentiation of osteoclast induced from bone marrow were studied in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 研究叶黄素对体外破骨细胞分化的影响。

sentences.english: He inhabited the old hut at the end of the garden, in company with Fauchelevent.
sentences.chinese: 他和老割风一同住在园底的破房子里。
